column2: "......apologies, it seems unnatural for someone like me to be here. I will leave immediately, please bear with me. "
"......everyone seems to be having so much fun, so many people smiling. Is there something fun happening here?"
"I'm not comfortable in crowded places like this. My presence becomes questionable and I get very shifty. "
"......I'm not always at Gettemhart's side. I like to have some time to myself as well."
"......what is right, and what is wrong? I'll never know. I tend not to think. "
"Do you require me at all? ......something you wish to ask? "
"......love between other species ......love. "
"......and this is what you ask me."
"......no, it's nothing. We are not acquainted enough for such considerations, and it cannot be avoided. "
"So there is only one thing I will say. ......there is nothing in particular I have to inform you. That is all. "
"If you would like to hear a proper story, then I recommend you speak to someone else. ......if you will then excuse me. "
"I am still inexperienced. I still need to train myself, both body and mind. "
"However it is impractical to undertake this alone...... So if the opportunity arises, I would like to be invited along to your mission. "
"......it's more efficient that way. "
"I will do what I am able to do. That is all I can do. There is nothing else I can do. "
"I will do what I am able to do. That is all I can do. There is nothing else I can do. "

"アフィンさんを見ていると
かつての自分を見ているような
そんな気持ちになります。"

"私に出来ることは少ないですが
何か力になれないかと
考えてしまうんです。"

"私はもう大丈夫です。
過去とはもう決着をつけましたから。"

"あの方と約束しましたから。
だからもう大丈夫です。"

"私もようやく前を向けそうです。
あの方が名前を呼んでくれましたから。"

"過去に縛られず、前を向いて
私は生きていきます。
そう……約束しましたから。"

"私はメルランディアです。
もう……メルフォンシーナでは
ありません。"
